title: Getting Started
text:
To add a new note: 
1. Type in the title and the text of the document.
2. Click on the save icon on the top left corner.

title: Display Saved Notes
text:
To display saved notes click on the note on the left side of the screen. When clicked, the note will display on the main screen. 

To go back and make a new note press on the + icon on the top right corner of the screen.

title: Delete Notes
text: To delete notes simply click on the delete icon next to the note you wish to delete.
